00030 enum {  
00031   GHNSStringSizeNone = 0,
00032   GHNSStringSizeTruncateAddEllipsis = 1, // Adds ellipsis after last fittable word
00033   GHNSStringSizeTruncateWrap = 2, // Just stops after last fittable word
00034   GHNSStringSizeTruncatePad = 3 // Leave some padding on last line
00035 };
